MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH46 postcode area of Wirral, affecting properties in Maryland Lane and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 9:07AM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 8:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:25PM 31st January 2021
